titles.title: Who are these which are arrayed in white robes?

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Who are these, which are arrayed in white robes?
Who are these, and from where do they come?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
These are they who came out,
These are they who came out,
These are they who come out of great tribulation.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And they have washed their robes and made them white, (3x)
In the blood of the Lamb.
